potential_effect: Construction delays due to heavy rains or storms
mitigation_strategy: Use weather forecasting to adjust the schedule, have contingency buffer time, and cover materials properly.
monitoring_plan: Daily weather tracking, emergency response readiness

potential_effect: Project delays due to late arrival of critical materials like concrete, benches, and playground equipment.
mitigation_strategy: Order materials in advance, have multiple suppliers, and maintain buffer stock.

potential_effect: Delays in site work due to worker unavailability or strikes.
mitigation_strategy: Cross-train workers, have backup labor sources, and provide incentives for workforce retention.
monitoring_plan: Daily workforce attendance tracking, contingency hiring

potential_effect: Excavation, pavement, or foundation work delays due to machinery failure.
mitigation_strategy: Regular maintenance, keep backup equipment on standby.
monitoring_plan: Weekly equipment inspections, emergency rental agreements

potential_effect: Cost overruns leading to funding shortages and scope reduction.
mitigation_strategy: Maintain financial buffer, use AI-based cost tracking and forecasting.
monitoring_plan: Monthly budget review, automated cost tracking

potential_effect: Project delays or stoppages due to missing permits or legal violations.
mitigation_strategy: Ensure early compliance checks, consult with legal teams.
monitoring_plan: Legal compliance audits, government liaison meetings

potential_effect: Delays or modifications due to public objections or protests.
mitigation_strategy: Conduct community engagement programs, get public buy-in through consultations.
monitoring_plan: Public sentiment tracking, stakeholder feedback sessions

potential_effect: Vandalism, theft, or safety hazards affecting project assets.
mitigation_strategy: Install temporary fencing, hire security personnel.

potential_effect: Budget overruns and timeline extensions due to unplanned design modifications.
mitigation_strategy: Strict change management process, limit mid-project modifications.
monitoring_plan: Weekly project scope review, approval-based design changes

potential_effect: Worksite injuries causing stoppages and legal issues.
mitigation_strategy: Strict safety protocols, personal protective equipment (PPE), regular training.
monitoring_plan: Daily safety inspections, accident response drills
